segments.text: Who's that tall guy over there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's George . He looks very drunk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , he's really reserved , normally . But , from what I hear , he's got lots of problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , off the record , of course , but I hear that he's got terrible debts . He has his own company , and it's not going very well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Well , I hate to say this , but I'm not surprised .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? What makes you say that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , he doesn't look very honest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , that's the problem . He can't find any customers . It's a pity , really , because his products are very good . Oh , that reminds me . Did I tell you about my new laptop ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , don't talk to me about laptops . Mine crashed on Friday and I lost everything . I hate them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look , I need another drink . Do you want one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll be back in a sec .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I'll wait here for you .
segments.speaker: S2
